Text.Page:
Ever hear the name Dirken? He's nominally in charge of the Cutthroat Harbor docks, which pretty much means the harbor as well.
He's asking us to pay fees for using the fishery there, and wants us to send a negotiator.

I can't think of anyone better suited to the task than you.
Dirken at Cutthroat Harbor requested help with pirates...and lunch.

You're an angler, aren't ya? Here to complain about the fee?

Well you see, we've been catching fish here for a while now...big ones. Our boats are the best there are, and we can't have a bunch of fish tourists standing around on the beach messing things up."So, the fee?"

Well actually, I don't actually eat fish myself, but I've a hankering ta' try.

I got this recipe a few days ago...I think it's for a Steamed Fish. But none of my guys are skilled enough to make it, so I have no idea what it's supposed to taste like.

You can cook, right? I'd be willing to bend on the fees if you make me a Steamed Fish.

I had my doubts to be honest. I didn't think you could do it.

Time for lunch!"Help yourself."

Darn! The olive scent with such a strong texture...this is pure beauty. Delicious!
The fee?
Ta' be honest with ya, I'm in a bit of a bind with some pirates. They...use a lot of fish, and have really stepped up their demands."Okay. How can I help?"

So I was thinkin', if there were fewer pirates, they'd eat less, right?

How about we fight those pirates together?
You in?
You done cookin' that Steamed Fish yet?

I got a plan, and it'll only work with a skilled fisher like you.

There's a camp of pirates south o' the harbor, and in that camp is a ruined ship.

That ship is the only place I know of where a special herb called Halluweed grows.
Be careful, it's a wee bit halu...hallu...you see things when you touch it.
It's best to pick the petals one by one.

You got them already?
Okay, here's the beauty part of the plan. Use the Halluweed as bait to catch some Funky Fresh Fish.

The smell is...intense, and will drive the pirates off for a while.
Three Funky Fresh Fish should be enough to do the job.

You done gathering Halluweed Petals?
I need at least three of 'em fer my cunning plan.

Whoo, what a smell! Guess I don't have to ask if you were successful.

Now we need chase away the pirates.

Once we lure them out of their hideout, they won't stand a chance against you!

Go talk to {@linkcreature:62#1043#Zaira}, who's working on the next part of our plan.

Did you catch any Deep Sea Fish?
If you run out of Halluweed, just go gather more.
I've prepared an stone bowl at the south of the harbor. Are you ready?

You made it.

Place the Funky Fresh Fish in the bowl.

It worked! Quick, go after their captain.
I'll be right behind you.

You've really taught those pirates a lesson!
They won't be here anymore now.

I'll contact the Fishing Association with the good news. We're family now, aren't we? Haha!
